docs.snippet: Bismark Lithgow, 26, faces a maximum of 25 years to life in prison for stabbing his girlfriend 38 times and hiding her body in a plastic barrel in his bedroom in Harlem....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bismark Lithgow, 26, faces a maximum of 25 years to life in prison for stabbing his girlfriend 38 times and hiding her body in a plastic barrel in his bedroom in Harlem.
docs.abstract: Harlem man Bismark Lithgow is convicted of second-degree murder in 2013 fatal stabbing of his girlfriend Francis Alfonso Pellerano.

headline.main: Harlem Man Is Convicted of Murdering His Girlfriend
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of Murdering His Girlfriend

docs.snippet: Archaeologists despaired that the Islamic State aimed to systematically destroy the relics at a wellspring of civilization....
docs.lead_paragraph: Archaeologists despaired that the Islamic State aimed to systematically destroy the relics at a wellspring of civilization.
docs.abstract: Islamic religious scholars, governments, museums and international preservationists denounce destruction of Iraq's archaeological treasures by members of Islamic State; note while many large artifacts have been destroyed, smaller items have been looted by fighters for sale on black market.

headline.main: ISIS Bulldozing of Ancient Nimrud Site in Iraq Stirs Outrage
headline.print_headline: Site of ISIS Vandalism Ranks Among World’s Most Important for Archaeologists

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and SOMINI SENGUPTA

docs.snippet: Russia's security service head said Saturday that two suspects in the killing of leading opposition figure Boris Nemtsov have been detained. Russian news reports later cited an official as saying one of them had served with police troops in Chechn...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia's security service head said Saturday that two suspects in the killing of leading opposition figure Boris Nemtsov have been detained. Russian news reports later cited an official as saying one of them had served with police troops in Chechnya.

headline.main: 2 Nemtsov Suspects Detained in Russia, Prompting Skepticism
headline.print_headline: 2 Nemtsov Suspects Detained in Russia, Prompting Skepticism

docs.snippet: Preet Bharara, the United States attorney in Manhattan, offered a notable silence on a corruption case involving the speaker of the New York Assembly after his public remarks became part of it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Preet Bharara, the United States attorney in Manhattan, offered a notable silence on a corruption case involving the speaker of the New York Assembly after his public remarks became part of it.
docs.abstract: Federal prosecutor Preet Bharara refrains, during speech at law school about public corruption, form making public remarks on case against former New York State Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver; lawyers for Silver had asked judge to dismiss indictment against him because of Bharara's earlier public comments that they assert have tainted case.

headline.main: U.S. Attorney Keeps Talking, but Leaves Out Sheldon Silver
headline.print_headline: U.S. Attorney Keeps Talking, but Leaves Out Sheldon Silver

docs.snippet: Amber Thompson’s teammates describe her as painfully reserved, but on the court she is one of the nation’s most aggressive rebounders, ranking 17th with 11.1 a game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amber Thompson’s teammates describe her as painfully reserved, but on the court she is one of the nation’s most aggressive rebounders, ranking 17th with 11.1 a game.

headline.seo: Amber Thompson Is a Steadying Influence at St. John’s
headline.main: Off Court, Red Storm’s Fiercest Rebounder Is Anything But
headline.print_headline: Off Court, Red Storm’s Fiercest Rebounder Is Anything But

docs.snippet: Inside a remote island prison in Indonesia, two Australians facing death by firing squad await word of their fate. To some, they are ruthless drug smugglers who deserve to die. To others, rehabilitated do-gooders who deserve to live. The question ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Inside a remote island prison in Indonesia, two Australians facing death by firing squad await word of their fate. To some, they are ruthless drug smugglers who deserve to die. To others, rehabilitated do-gooders who deserve to live. The question of which characterization is correct has threatened ties between two once-close countries, both convinced they are right.

headline.main: Indonesia Executions Show Hurdles of Death Penalty Diplomacy
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Executions Show Hurdles of Death Penalty Diplomacy

docs.snippet: After a blogger accused her of being a closeted lesbian, Li Yinhe, an advocate of freewheeling sexuality in China, announced that her partner of 17 years is a transgender man....
docs.lead_paragraph: After a blogger accused her of being a closeted lesbian, Li Yinhe, an advocate of freewheeling sexuality in China, announced that her partner of 17 years is a transgender man.
docs.abstract: Saturday Profile of Li Yinhe, leading Chinese advocate for relaxing of sexual norms, who stunned country when she revealed on her blog that her partner of 17 years is transgender man; public reaction since revelation has been surprisingly sympathetic, as has news media coverage, and Li sees in reaction reaffirmation of her view that everyday Chinese are very tolerant, unlike tradition-bound men in charge of country.

headline.main: Sex Expert’s Secret Is Out, and China’s Open to It
headline.print_headline: Sex Expert’s Secret Is Out, and China’s Open to It
